prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
Bengaluru, Karnataka
PRITHVIRAJ KOUNTE 7755919303 •
prithvikounte2@gmail.com •
Graphic Designer
linkedin.com/in/prithvirajkounte •
behance.net/PrithviKounte •
OBJECTIVE
Graphic Designer & Video Editor skilled in motion graphics, branding, and strategic storytelling to enhance
audience engagement and brand presence, ensuring both aesthetic appeal and strategic impact.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
NetImpact Strategies Inc.
Graphic Designer, Sep 2023 - May 2024
● Created engaging motion graphics and videos for digital campaigns.
● Designed product logos and demo videos for DX360 Applications.
● Managed brand consistency across website, LinkedIn and YouTube channels.
● Created PowerPoint presentations and video previews for events and showcases.
HQL Solutions Pvt Ltd
Graphic Designer and Social Media Manager, Feb 2021 - Nov 2022
● Created and managed visual content for social media platforms, increasing engagement by 35%.
● Maintained version control and organisation of graphic files to streamline workflows.
● Developed branding materials aligned with company objectives.
AffinityX - Global Advertisers
Associate Graphic Designer, Jun 2019 - Feb 2021
● Created newsletter ads along with marketing visuals, infographics, and digital ads.
● Designed branding materials, including logos, brochures, and advertisements, for global clients.
● Ensured all projects adhered to branding standards and were delivered on time.
EDUCATION ADDITIONAL SKILLS
Arena Animation, Pune, Maharashtra ● Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator.
Diploma in graphic design and print media. ● Premiere Pro, After Effects.
● Typography & Visual Communication.
Gulbarga University
● Knowledge of Camera and Shooting Techniques.
Bachelor of Business Management (BBM) in Marketing.
Maya Academy of Advanced Creativity
Specialized in Video Graphics & Animation.
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
